title: Patriot Act
question: What are the main provisions of the Patriot Act?
context: The Patriot Act, passed after the September 11th attacks, expanded government surveillance powers and gave law enforcement agencies new tools to investigate terrorism.

answers.text: Expanded government surveillance powers and gave law enforcement agencies new tools to investigate terrorism.

title: Voting Rights Act of 1965
question: What was the primary purpose of the Voting Rights Act of 1965?
context: The Voting Rights Act of 1965 aimed to eliminate racial discrimination in voting by outlawing literacy tests and other discriminatory practices.

answers.text: To eliminate racial discrimination in voting by outlawing literacy tests and other discriminatory practices.

title: No Child Left Behind Act
question: What were the main goals of the No Child Left Behind Act?
context: The No Child Left Behind Act aimed to improve the quality of education in the United States by holding schools accountable for student achievement and implementing standardized testing.

answers.text: To improve the quality of education in the United States by holding schools accountable for student achievement and implementing standardized testing.
